comp_chem_utils.utils.change_vector_norm(fix, mob, R)[source]¶

given a fix position: fix(x,y,z) and a mobile position: mob(x,y,z) and a new vector magnitude: R we output new coordinates for the mobile position such that the distance fix-mob is R without changing the direction.
